download-modal.title: Download {{name}}
download-modal.title-tooltip: Leave empty to use the title given by the provider

tl-lang.label: Language
tl-lang.tooltip: Will only download chapters in the selected language

scanlation_group.label: Scanlation group
scanlation_group.tooltip: Prioritise chapters from this group, fallback is controlled in the advanced section

download_one_shot.label: Download OneShot
download_one_shot.tooltip: A chapter is a OneShot if it has no chapter number

include_cover.label: Include cover
include_cover.tooltip: Adds a cover image, can be nice to turn off for webtoons

update_cover.label: Update cover
update_cover.tooltip: Checks if the currently downloaded cover is outdated

include_not_matched_tags.label: Add not matched tags to ComicInfo
include_not_matched_tags.tooltip: Tags not configured to be a genre, will be added as tags instead

no-sub-dir.label: Download into parent
no-sub-dir.tooltip: Content will be copied in your selected dir, instead of creating child directory first

allow_non_matching_scanlation_group.label: Scanlation group fallback
allow_non_matching_scanlation_group.tooltip: Use chapters from different scanlation groups, default to true

assign_empty_volumes.label: Assign empty volumes
assign_empty_volumes.tooltip: Assign volume 1 to chapters without a volume, if at least one other volume is present

edit-subscription-modal.title: Edit your subscription on: {{name}}
edit-subscription-modal.title-tooltip: This title is only visual and does not effect the underlying download
edit-subscription-modal.content-id-tooltip: The id from your provider, must be correct
edit-subscription-modal.provider-tooltip: Which provider is this subscription using
edit-subscription-modal.refresh-frequency-tooltip: How often should this subscription be downloaded

edit-user-modal.title: Edit {{name}}
edit-user-modal.user-tooltip: Changing this without the username knowing may lock them out of their account
edit-user-modal.email-tooltip: Used to match on OIDC logins

edit-page-modal.title: Edit page {{name}}
edit-page-modal.wiki: Pages form the central way to search and download content with Media-Provider, each page will be a tab in the navigation bar. And allow you to search content from at least one provider. You'll be able to adjust on which things you can filter while downloading. For more information see the wiki.
edit-page-modal.wiki-modifiers: Modifiers are an import part of the search experience, you can configure them to help you narrow down results, apart from name. Each provider has different modifiers it can use to narrow down your search. See the wiki for more information. Read the wiki carefully to ensure you use the correct keys for the modifiers. Modifiers are always configured with a list of key-value pairs. The key is what the provider will use to search, while the display name is what will be shown on your screen.
edit-page-modal.title-tooltip: The title displayed in the navigation bar
edit-page-modal.icon-tooltip: Optional icon displayed in the navigation bar
edit-page-modal.custom-root-dir-tooltip: Base directory to start the dir picker in
edit-page-modal.dirs-tooltip: Optional list of directories to pick from
edit-page-modal.delete-modifier: Are you sure you want to delete {{title}}?

edit-page-modifier-modal.title: Edit modifier {{title}}
edit-page-modifier-modal.title-tooltip: The name of the modifier, displayed in the page form
edit-page-modifier-modal.key-tooltip: The key as defined on the wiki, if this is incorrect the modifier will not do anything

callback.title: Authenticating...
callback.message: Please wait while we complete your sign-in.
callback.info: This should only take a moment

login.welcome-tagline: Access your account securely and quickly

no-changes.title: Not saving changes
no-changes.summary: Remove the content if you wish nothing to be downloaded

dashboard.confirm-stop: Are you sure you want to stop {{name}}

success.title: Success
success.summary: Content marked as ready for download, will begin as soon as possible

notifications.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete {{title}}?
notifications.confirm-delete-many: Are you sure you want to delete {{amount}} notification(s)?
notifications.confirm-read-many: Are you sure you want to mark {{amount}} notification(s) as read?

pages.title: Pages
pages.name: Name
pages.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to remove page: {{title}}?

already-adding-new.title: Cannot add modifier value
already-adding-new.summary: All modifiers must be filled in before adding a new one

dir-required.title: You must provide at least one download directory

provider-required.title: You must at least selected one provided

invalid-modifier.title: Invalid modifier {{title}}
invalid-modifier.summary: Ensure all modifiers have their key and title set

invalid-modifier-values.title: Invalid modifier {{title}}
invalid-modifier-values.summary: Ensure all modifier values have their key and value set

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.tags-to-genre-tooltip: The following tags will be added as a genre when downloading from Dynasty or Bato, add or remove as wanted.
preferences.tags-blacklist-tooltip: Any tags configured here will not be used as either a Genre or Tag. Check documentation for how matching happens.
preferences.tags-whitelist-tooltip: Any tags configured here will be used as tag, if it's not in the blacklist or configured to be used as a genre. Check documentation for how matching happens.
preferences.age-rating-mappings-tooltip: Configure which tags and/or genre's will be used to determine the downloaded content's AgeRating. If several are present, the highest will be used.
preferences.tags-mappings-tooltip: Configure how tags are transformed before being processed by anything else.

sub-refresh.label: Download subscriptions at
sub-refresh.tooltip: The hour at which subscriptions should run

preferences.logEmptyDownloads-tooltip: Get a notification when a subscription downloads 0 items
preferences.convertToWebp-tooltip: Convert images to webp before downloading (pasloe)

dynasty-duplicate.title: Genre already present
dynasty-duplicate.summary: Genres are normalized, may not find the exact genre in the list

blacklist-duplicate.title: Tag already present
blacklist-duplicate.summary: Tags are normalized, may not find the exact tag in the list

cache.label: Cache type
cache.subTitle: Redis allows requests to be cached between restarts

max-images.label: Max Images
max-images.subTitle: Amount of images(/chapter) downloaded at once, not shared between providers

authority.label: Authority
authority.subTitle: Must have the discovery endpoint accessible

autoLogin.label: Auto redirect to your OIDC login page

clientSecret.label: Client secret
clientSecret.subTitle: Once set, won't display the actual value

users.title: Users
users.name: Name
users.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
users.confirm-reset-api-key: Are you sure you want to reset your ApiKey?
users.confirm-reset-password: Are you sure you want to reset {{name}}'s password?

success.title: Reset your Api Key
success.summary: Key has been copied to clipboard

success.title: Reset generated
success.summary: The reset link has been copied to your clipboard. A copy may be found in your server logs

subscriptions.title: Title
subscriptions.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to remove your subscription on {{title}}?

success.title: Success
success.summary: {{name}} has been added to the download queue

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address.
errors.sameAs: Value must be the same as {{error.value.other}}

username.label: Username
username.subTitle: Can be anything, but must be unique
